original_title: Sweethearts Special Part 18: My First Girlfriend
overview: Sweethearts Special 18 by Eromaxx Films is a cute movie featuring girls who seem like good girls but who are secretly really bad! They love to fuck their boyfriends and try all sorts of nasty things while still retaining a certain sense of innocence. Starring Dulsineya, Jessica Neight, Connie, Liza Shay, Irina Bruni, Sinovia, Abby Bynes, Marry Dream and Kristina First.
title: Sweethearts Special Part 18: My First Girlfriend
